column5:
POSTPOSITION: Used to mark past tense in literary contexts
ADVERB: After
Widely considered to be racially motivated against Kali, use with caution, there is not a good alternative besides spelling it out alphabetically
Widely considered to be racially motivated Kaneed, specifically Baphians, use with caution, there is not a good alternative besides spelling it out alphabetically
Cholto is a filler word, like “well”, it can also be used as a diminutive
